external_references.description: Booz Allen Hamilton. (2016). When The Lights Went Out. Retrieved December 18, 2024.

Electricity Information Sharing and Analysis Center; SANS Industrial Control Systems. (2016, March 18). Analysis of the Cyber Attack on the Ukranian Power Grid: Defense Use Case. Retrieved March 27, 2018.

objects.description: During the [2015 Ukraine Electric Power Attack](https://attack.mitre.org/campaigns/C0028), [Sandworm Team](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0034) scheduled the uninterruptable power supplies (UPS) to shutdown data and telephone servers via the UPS management interface. (Citation: Ukraine15 - EISAC - 201603)(Citation: Booz Allen Hamilton)
